text: Flap steak is a type of meat cut. It comes from the bottom sirloin. It is a thin piece of beef. This cut can also be used to make ground beef. Flap meat is usually confused with cuts from the plate meats. Sometimes, it is sold as skirt steak even though it does not come from the plate. ==Preparation== Like most steaks, the flap steak can be cooked with different methods. == References == Category:Cuts of beef
title: Flap steak
